member.name: MIB_IPNETTABLE
member.summary: TheMIB_IPNETTABLE structure contains a table of Address Resolution Protocol (ARP) entries for IPv4 addresses.

member.name: MIB_IPNETTABLE.dwNumEntries
member.summary: The number of ARP entries in the table.

member.name: MIB_IPNETTABLE.table
member.summary: A pointer to a table of ARP entries implemented as an array of structures.
